website_summaries.verdict: Nice choice when you have to make dozens of patties at one time for a big party.
pros: The press fits the palm of your hand nicely, so you don’t have to apply as much pressure to create the patties
Ships with 200 non-stick patty papers, which means you’re receiving a good value
Allows you to make patties of either one-third or one-quarter pound sizes
cons: Hardware has a coating that may begin to peel off after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not good. Not sure what happened but the coating is coming off. Can't use it only lasted six months
customer_reviews.author: chris baker

customer_reviews.title: Take the guess work out of hamburgers
customer_reviews.text: This product is great to make hamburgers that will cook at the same rate and serve as portion control. I am 6'3" tall and 280 lbs I always would eat a little more than I should and have since started following portion control on dinners this device makes it easy to do it is easy to clean and use great product can't wait for first summer BBQ to see how it works with burgers on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Paquette

customer_reviews.title: For us, this is exactly what we were lookng for.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 40 pounds of 1 lb hamburger packages. We mix in our seasoning, we weight out 3 per pound and press out burgers. They come out just right. The paper dividers are something that is really handy to get them out of the maker after each press. I would recommend this if you're looking for an easy, quick way to make burgers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use easy to clean 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: I think I'm going to give it just got done using it today. I've used others in the past that are hinged and have a lot more adjustments to make different sized workers. I find this simple design seems to work the best. Very easy to clean very easy to use. Like ever people have commented before make sure that the parchment paper you use is at least 5.5 in. The parchment paper that comes with it is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew N.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: “This press works really well. I bought a 6 pound package of hamburger and turned it into perfectly shaped, equal sized hamburgers in 20 minutes or so. The aluminum cleans up well, and the non stick papers were a welcome addition. So far I'm impressed, and I expect to last for quite some time. Don't get a plastic press - go for this one. "
customer_reviews.author: Customer Name

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Needs One
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing timesaver! I love the patty width and the grooves on both sides,they hold the seasoning very well. Meat cooks perfectly even. I don’t know why I ever made a burger w/o this. If you’re making a bunch of burgers at once for immediate consumption you can just re-use the same 2 papers. 85/15 beef is my personal favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Fer Jr.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT !!I
customer_reviews.text: GREAT HEAVY DUTY press...gonna buy these for all 4 of our male members of the family for Christmas....easy to use...and good sized burgers....HIGHLY RECOMMEND !!!" DO NOT put a treated non stick product of ANY BRAND in the dishwasher...they operate at VERY high temps.....that is why we bought them....good soap and water is all that is needed....I use Joy....cuts grease, and is a good cleaner... NO DISHWASHER....ask any chef.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Burger Press
customer_reviews.text: My family loves burgers, and this press did not disappoint. I grind my own meat for our burger, and this burger press adds that little extra touch. The burger patties look as though it was professionally prepared. And they also provided wax paper squares for pressing the patties. Great burger press, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cookies7007

customer_reviews.title: How did I make burgers without this? What a time and money saver!
customer_reviews.text: I now buy 5 lbs of ground beef or more at a time and press out a bunch of burgers and freeze them. I save a lot of money and the burgers are all uniform and just the right size. I'd say they make 1/4 to 1/2 lb burgers, depending on how much meat you put in there. The meat comes out easily and it's a breeze to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I like that hamburger patties can be perfectly packed and the same exact size. During the summer we grill out a lot and I can’t tell you how much time and food this saved us. We all know what happens when it’s not packed right or if it was to small or too large. Any-who, a great product that the wife and I both enjoying using.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My first inclination was to buy one with an automatic release, different size settings, etc. but decided to simplify (and save some money) with this burger press. Works great, perfect size, easy to store and clean. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get the patties out, no papers needed.
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time for my burgers. I did not need the papers, as getting the burgers out was easy. I make 1/2 lb burgers and this worked great! Any bigger and I couldn’t have fit it in, but this was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Struczewski

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use!
customer_reviews.text: This press is just awesome and so simple to use that my husband even uses it!! That’s saying a whole lot 😂! So don’t be browsing thru all those presses ... this is the one!! You will not be sorry!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Bachner

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The groves that it makes in the burger is what makes it worth the money. Tip put wax paper on the bottom plate then meat then another wax paper on top Of the meat then press the burger works awesome that way.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan R

customer_reviews.title: A perfect press
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, to make life easier, when making hamburgers. Even stuffed burgers
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Best Burgers Ever Made!
customer_reviews.text: I had 8oz I had ground turkey, so I figured I’d try it out. I am soooo excited about this burger press! I made 2 burgers, both of perfect size. They cooked better than any turkey burger that I ever made!
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: "Burger press worked ok but had to gently put burgers in freezer so they would not come apart as I put them on the grill so I advise planning ahead to include this step"
customer_reviews.author: Back in the recliner

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I really like it and it works well. The only thing I would change is the handle. I wish the handle was built in rather than screwed in. Other than that it’s a great product nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is great! Went to store and got hamburger meat and ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my burger press two days ago. It is great! Went to store and got hamburger meat and made patties in just a few minutes. I use to work in an ice cream parlor and used a larger commercial designed press. The size of this one is easy to use and easier to wash in dishwasher. If you are looking for one- get this one..
customer_reviews.author: Jim Boothman

customer_reviews.title: Aluminum
customer_reviews.text: I do like the durability of this product and I have used it probably 8 times already so far very consistent with the thickness of the Patty in releases well without the use of the paper.
customer_reviews.author: coop and coop

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Much easier than hand forming. We buy bulk, make patties, vac pack and freeze. Nice even burgers cook better and are all done at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Wilson

customer_reviews.title: “ I love this hamburger press
customer_reviews.text: “ I love this hamburger press, it works great for perfect burgers! And the square papers are best to remove the patties from the press. "
customer_reviews.author: SwampThing

customer_reviews.title: Great Burger Press
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the purchase of the Cave Tools Burger Press. It was light, simple and easy to clean. Made the job of making burgers fast and easy. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine FL

customer_reviews.title: This one's a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a burger press that won't break, is easy to clean, and takes up almost no space. The included paper is a great time-saver. A definite must-have for grillers.
customer_reviews.author: HighTechSvc

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect 1/3 pound patties
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and easy to get patties out of maker ... good for all types of meat I use for hamburger , turkey burgers, patties come out the same size always making it easy to grill to have them all done at the same time...
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy little press that seems well made. Less than an inch thick though, so don't count on super fat burgers (but I think they all might be that way). The papers really help get the meat out after pressing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Heff

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: “This item was exactly as advertised in their ad, it arrived in the correct time frame in excellent shape. Works great make great burgers the correct thickness. "
customer_reviews.author: Martin Rockett

customer_reviews.title: Great hamburger press
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a hamburger press before. I found it easy to use and clean, I would use it from now and ever
customer_reviews.author: Judith L Zoerb

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: It's very basic and that's just what I wanted. It's very sturdy, easy to clean, and makes a good hamburger patties.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: I think its all here?
customer_reviews.text: Look like its all here. Box was in a prime bag, an opened up. Thats why I’m scoring it low. Take it up with Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Todd Hewett

customer_reviews.title: Nice burger press
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking at these for a long time, finally bought one. Love this one, very easy to use, clean and the papers that come with it are great!
customer_reviews.author: Teri Bracher

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for hamburger lovers! Easy to use. Arrived on time and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda M. Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: Press lookd good but does not work well
customer_reviews.text: When pessing the meat with the top of the unit my meat stickes into it and does not come out well at all. I can use it if I only use my palm. Would not tell anyone to buy. The top press has interior design that is to give you a grilll look and this is were the meat sticks. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but hard to press
customer_reviews.text: I like this burger press rather than trying to shape hamburgers myself. My only complaint is I don't have the strength to press the meat to the edges, but my son does it for me so it all works out.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. It's metal and makes perfectly sized burgers.
customer_reviews.author: S. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Love this product for making patties
customer_reviews.text: This is sooooo easy to use and makes the perfect size patty. I use the wax paper inside and on top of the meat which them keeps this tool almost perfectly clean. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to make a large quantity of burgers for freezing. Works really well and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: DC in the CT

customer_reviews.title: works very well
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm and comes with 100 wax papers. Makes 1/4 to 1/3 lb. burgers and cleans up well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Makes consistent burgers for ease of cooking
customer_reviews.text: I was making several burgers for the freezer and borrowed my son's Cave Tools burger press...I usually do this by hand. I was very impressed with how easy the press was to use and clean afterwards. So I decided to purchase one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Good quality works well
customer_reviews.text: Faster neater burgers...essential for perfect grill out... works well and sturdy...
customer_reviews.author: tumbleshrub

customer_reviews.title: For having this good product.
customer_reviews.text: They say “3rd time is the charm”. So true in this case. I bought two prior to yours and this one is the charm. Thank you. Also, I put the box it came in, in recycling. I would appreciate getting the recipe book that came with it. Thank you very much, again, for having this product. ,
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Dowling

customer_reviews.title: simple and easy
customer_reviews.text: For what it is it works fine - nothing fancy, easy to clean and store - bottom line a great tool for a good price - don't forget to use the waxed paper squares, they are a big help to remove the burger or whatever you're making
customer_reviews.author: Kim DeSimone

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy it came with the papers. A good value.
customer_reviews.author: Pangai

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I was a little underwhelmed I thought the burgers would be bigger and probably would have sent it back but I opened the package of wrappers so I can’t .. it did come as advertised but can’t understand the rave reviews
customer_reviews.author: jokocur

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: great way to save money. I buy meat in bulk and make fresh patties. cleans up good, easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this! We never buy preformed burgers anymore. He loves to mix chopped onion, green pepper and bread crumbs into hamburger, then form the mixture into patties. I love to let him!
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Kay

customer_reviews.title: It does the job and forms a nice round patty
customer_reviews.text: It does the job and forms a nice round patty. With the included papers it releases the patty from the mold easily.
customer_reviews.author: fp

customer_reviews.title: Easy, easy, easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean, doesn’t take too much pressure to Mark and form the patties.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Martens

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and EASY to clean. I just use a kitchen scale to make all the patties the same size, and there are no bolts to remove or tiny crevices to clean. Thank you, Cave Tools!
customer_reviews.author: MsBellaBug

customer_reviews.title: "Great Product"
customer_reviews.text: This item is well made and easy to use to get a good formed patty. great product for the money! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I wish was the burger was a bit wider not thicker just a little bit more wide, currently it is almost like a big slider. But I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lew

customer_reviews.title: Burgers!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usual hand form my burgers, but this thing was worthy of making a mass amount with ease!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Use the papers as instructed when pressing the meat for burgers
customer_reviews.text: I always used to buy frozen patties, but there was always to many in the box. Now I just buy fresh ground chuck and make what I need. Great burger press.
customer_reviews.author: Dar Dar

customer_reviews.title: Ok burger maker, but there are better for a few dollars more
customer_reviews.text: Ok burger maker. I bought a Weston brand and I like it better because it self-centers itself to make a consistently thick burger.

customer_reviews.title: Needed for making burgers. Time saver
customer_reviews.text: All burgers same size evenly cook. Patties not broken like before. Grill marks. Will be using it during the summer.

customer_reviews.title: Good But The Recipe Book Link Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Why have it in the box if it isn't available? I was kind of looking forward to it.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this burger press. Makes perfect 1/3lb patties that don’t shrink up too much when you grill them. Also cleans up easy in the dishwasher. It came with 250 sheets of butcher paper that make stacking patties for the grill much less messy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Olson

customer_reviews.title: Is just a mold, nothing that anything circular wouldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Is just a mold, nothing that anything circular wouldn't do. I guess is faster to make a bunch. Comes with film/paper to separate burgers.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product

customer_reviews.title: Hamburger Press

product_meta.title: Cave Tools Burger Press - Perfectly Formed Hamburger Maker - Includes 200 Non Stick Patty Papers for Making Quarter Lb or Large 1/3 Pound Stuffed Pocket Burgers - Best Aluminum Presser BBQ Gift Idea
feature_bullets: *** INSTANT 10% SAVINGS ON PURCHASE OF 2 OR MORE *** Burger Maker Cuts Preparation Time In Half So You Can Spend More Time Eating Burgers With Your Family - Use Indicator Line For 1/4 Pounders or Completely Fill For Big 1/3 Pound Hamburgers
Palm Shaped Hamburger Press Handle Reduces Fatigue When Pressing Multiple Burgers - Consistent Size & Shape Every Time So They Cook Evenly On The Grill
Includes Bonus 200 Square Burger Papers Which Makes Removing & Separating Your Burgers a Breaze - Dishwasher Safe For Speedy Cleanup in The Kitchen
COMES WITH 25 PROFESSIONAL BARBECUE RECIPES - step by step instructions and detailed grilling tutorial videos - Free Download Meat Smoking Journal iOS & Android App
LIFETIME SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - If at any point you are unhappy with your aluminum burger press maker you can return it for a full money back refund. We Take Customer Service That Seriously
